content.raw:
This was after installing the bad_read branch and using gzserver_memcheck  as gzname in test launch file.

```
rostest atlas_utils atlas_sandia_hands_publishers_hz_gpu.test --text
```

```
==11163== Conditional jump or move depends on uninitialised value(s)
==11163==    at 0xA12134B: gazebo::physics::ODEJoint::Load(boost::shared_ptr<sdf::Element>) (ODEJoint.cc:144)

==11163==    by 0x5E44D3A: gazebo::physics::World::Load(boost::shared_ptr<sdf::Element>) (World.cc:241)
==11163==    by 0x5E2F693: gazebo::physics::load_world(boost::shared_ptr<gazebo::physics::World>, boost::shared_ptr<sdf::Element>) (Physics.cc:119)

==11163==  Uninitialised value was created by a heap allocation
==11163==    at 0x4C2B1C7: operator new(unsigned long) (in /usr/lib/valgrind/vgpreload_memcheck-amd64-linux.so)
==11163==    by 0xA0FA332: gazebo::physics::ODEPhysics::CreateJoint(std::string const&, boost::shared_ptr<gazebo::physics::Model>) (ODEPhysics.cc:699)
==11163==    by 0x5E19B81: gazebo::physics::Model::LoadJoint(boost::shared_ptr<sdf::Element>) (Model.cc:647)
```

content.html:
This was after installing the bad_read branch and using gzserver_memcheck as gzname in test launch file.

rostest atlas_utils atlas_sandia_hands_publishers_hz_gpu.test --text
